name: Storage Hunter
description:
Play as one of the bidders for abandoned warehouses and containers. You start with small things and smaller warehouses in the cargo port. Bid on warehouses that people haven't paid rent for
Earn more money and skills when you are ready to start bidding for a lot of money. It happens that nobody admits to the container in the port. This is an opportunity for you! You will find everything there, from home furnishings to cars, or even ... military.
Thousands of items are waiting for you. Bid and then sell it at the Pawnshop.

Planned functionalities:
- warehouse auctions
container auctions
skills development
cooperation with pawnshops
own Pawnshop, and hence, more profits for you
thousands of items to bid on
several locations
hours of great entertainment: D
